
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("absenteeismData.csv") %>% 
  filter(Grade == "All Grades" & Year =='2020-21')
```

```{r}
data2 <- read.csv("demographicData.csv") %>% 
  filter(Year =='2020-21')
```

```{r}
joined_data <- data %>%
  full_join(data2, by="DBN", suffix=c("",".y")) %>%
  select(-ends_with(".y"))
```



#Binary Poverty Level Variable
```{r}
cat <- joined_data %>% 
  mutate(Poverty = case_when(X..Poverty.1 == "Above 95%" ~ "Above 95%",
                             X..Poverty.1 != "Above 95%" ~ "Below 95%"))
```

```{r}
joined_data$X..Chronically.Absent.1 <- as.numeric(as.character(joined_data$X..Chronically.Absent.1))

```
